text: The wolves were trying to surprise a flock of sheep. But thanks to the guard dogs, they couldn't get it. So they decided to use their cunning. And they sent messengers to the shepherds, saying, Give them back to the dogs, saying, The dogs are the ones that make war between us and you. You just have to hand them over to us and peace will reign among us. And the naive sheepmen, without knowing what would happen, handed over the dogs, and the wolves, now free of the dogs, seized the flock without difficulty. Never turn over the enemies who support you.
title: Los lobos y los carneros
author: nan Esopo
